Detailed Description

Return or multiply by powers of 2.

With some compilers it's fastest to do a table lookup of powers of 2. If RANDOMLIB_POWERTABLE is 1, a lookup table is used. If RANDOMLIB_POWERTABLE is 0, then std::pow is used.
